import React, { useContext } from 'react' import './userStyle.css' import { Logout } from './Logout' import { UserContext } from './UserProvider' import { Redirect, Link } from 'react-router-dom' function UserProfile({ authorized }) { const { email } = useContext(UserContext) if (!authorized) { return

Log in to sign in your profile

} return (

Account

Hi {email},

we are glad to see you in our store!
Let's do some shopping!

) } export default UserProfile
